# 2004 Jade Solid Gold Awards

The 2004 Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation () was held in January 2005. It is part of the Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation series held in Hong Kong.
Top 10 song awards
The top 10 songs (十大勁歌金曲) of 2004 are as follows.
